message.content: Fine crossing, wouldn't you say? These waters have been good to me for twenty years. The Adriatic can be temperamental, but she was kind to us today. *adjusts his captain's hat* I noticed your interest in our cargo manifests during the journey. Are you here for trade? Many newcomers arrive with grand ambitions but lack reliable transport for their goods. A captain with experience navigating both the sea routes and the bureaucracy of the Republic can be... invaluable. *gestures toward the bustling Rialto district visible beyond the harbor* What business brings you to La Serenissima?

game_context.economic_relevance: Niccolò offers reliable shipping services for import/export businesses
